text: 3. The Householder reflector H = I —2uu’, where the vector u satisfies [lul]2 = 1, is an effective tool for solving linear least-squares problems and other problems. Prove that H is perfectly conditioned, i.e., its condition number is equal to 1: ko(H) = 1. Show all your steps. Do not rely on any general arguments - you are being asked to provide a full and detailed answer here.
